thread.section_title: DriveTime Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveTime | www.drivetime.com
thread.title: Mary Clark

author: Mary Clark
title: Mary Clark
text: I went with my daughter to get her first official car with a loan, she had no credit history. Marcus(sales rep) and Laura(finance) made us comfortable and relaxed. We actually had a lot of fun, a lot more fun than any car buying experience I have ever had and I'm 47! I have 3 more boys 1 of age and 2 closing quick and this is where I want to take all 3 of them for their vehicles! I totally recommend this company and these people. Great experience! Thank you!
